Name: NC001 - pdf for the Nitrogen calculator form
Output_template:
{"name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
Form name {form_name}
Reference {reference}
Date {today_en}

Application details

{#customer/SF_Sum}
Date {dateApp}
Planning application reference number {planningRef}
Site name {site}
@af:if({additionalInfo} != '')
Additional information {#additionalInfo}
@endaf:if

Stage 1

Enter the number of housing units proposed {housingUnits}
@af:if({housingUnits} != '')
Total net population increase generated by the development {populationIncrease}
Total wastewater volume generated by the development (litres per day) {wastewaterVolume}
@endaf:if
Select the wastewater treatment works the development will connect to {treatmentSelected}
@af:if({treatment} != '')
Wastewater treatment works' permit limit (mg per litre) {permitLimit}
@endaf:if
@af:if({permitLimit} != '')
Wastewater treatment works' discharge level(mg per litre) {dischargeLevel}
@endaf:if
@af:if({dischargeLevel} != '')
Acceptable nitrogen loading in wastewater (mg per litre) {nitrogenLoading}
@endaf:if
@af:if({nitrogenLoading} != '')
Total nitrogen discharged by WwTW (mg per day) {nitrogenDischarged}
Total nitrogen discharged by WwTW (kg per day) {nitrogenDischarged2}
Total nitrogen discharged by WwTW (kg per year) {nitrogenDischarged3}
@endaf:if
Is there a change to the land use? {changeLand}
@af:if({changeLand} = 'yes')
Does any part of the existing land use drain to the Solent catchment? {drain}
@endaf:if
@af:if({drain} = 'yes')

Stage 2

Enter the total area of the development site (in hectares) {totalArea}
Enter area currently used for urban development (hectares) {urbanArea}
Enter area currently used for open space / greenfield (hectares) {openArea}
Enter area currently used for woodland (hectares) {woodlandArea}
Enter area currently used for community food growing / catchment average (hectares) {foodArea}
Enter area currently used for cereals (hectares) {cerealsArea}
Enter area currently used for dairy (hectares) {dairyArea}
Enter area currently used for general cropping (hectares) {croppingArea}
Enter area currently used for horticulture (hectares) {horticultureArea}
Enter area currently used for pig farming (hectares) {farmingArea}
Enter area currently used for lowland grazing (hectares) {grazingArea}
Enter area currently used for mixed farming (hectares) {mixedArea}
Enter area currently used for poultry farming (hectares) {poultryArea}
Total {totalSumArea}
Total nitrogen load from current land usage (kg per year) {totalCurrent}
@endaf:if
@af:if({totalArea} = {totalSumArea} and {drain} = 'yes')

Stage 3

Enter the total urban area to be created (hectares) {urbanArea3}
Enter the total designated open space / Suitable Alternative Natural Greenspace (SANG) area to be created (hectares) {openSpace}
Enter the total nature reserve area to be created (hectares) {natureReserve}
Enter the total woodland area to be created (hectares) {woodlandArea3}
Enter the total community orchard area to be created (hectares) {orchardArea}
Enter the total community food growing / allotment area to be created (hectares) {allotment}
Total {total3}
Total nitrogen load from future land uses (kg per year) {totalFuture}
@endaf:if

Stage 4

Nitrogen leaving wastewater treatment works (kg per year) {wastewaterTreatment}
Net change in nitrogen load from future land use (kg per year) {futureUse}
Nitrogen budget for the site (kg per year) {siteBudget}
Precautionary nitrogen budget (kg per year) {precautionaryBudget}
Total nitrogen budget for the proposed development (kg per year) {totalBudget}
@af:if({totalBudget} > '0')

Development will generate additional nitrogen - mitigation is required. Please liaise with your Local Planning Authority for advice on next steps.

@endaf:if
@af:if({totalBudget} <= '0')

Development will be nitrogen neutral - no mitigation is required.

@endaf:if
"}
